result.execSummary:
The defendant Matias Jaimes Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carrying a Concealed Knife, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.231.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant is ordered to submit a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Zoom appearances.
Defendant in custody in Manitowoc County Jail.
NO CONTEST plea entered to the charge of carry concealed knife. Convicted.
The defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for fifty (50) days, time served.
Defendant has credit for 55 days.
$443.00 court costs imposed, to be paid by 11-26-22 or 9 days county jail for failure to pay.
DNA sample ordered.
Minutes.
Bail/bond hearing on September 26, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Notice of Motion and Motion for Bond Modification

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.   
Not guilty plea.   Jury Calendar.   Offer deadline with DA is set for 09-23-22 at 8:30 a.m.   Scheduling conference is set for 11-09-22 at 9:00 a.m.    
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Matias Jaimes Jr
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 08-10-2022)
Prior: 2018 Silver Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Order to report to MTPD for photo and prints
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of carry concealed knife.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 08-11-22 at 10:30 a.m.  Bail is set at $500.00 cash bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 48 hours or, if incarcerated, within 72 hours of release, defendant is not to possess any dangerous weapons and defendant must maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the custody of the Sheriff. 
Minutes.
